item.description:
We will be meeting around 6:15, give or take a few minutes for people who are commuting.

We'll meet in the middle of the Salem Common, as always.

For those of you worried about the number of people, there are generally people who meet up with us to play who are not a part of the meetup group.

See you there.

group.name: The Salem Ultimate Frisbee Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Ultimate Frisbee Meetup
